name: HSP_CLAIM_PRINT
description: This table contains claim print record information for claims associated with a given hospital account or liability bucket.

columns.name: CLAIM_PRINT_ID
columns.description: Stores the claim record ID associated with a single hospital account or liability bucket.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE_REAL
columns.description: The contact date for the creation of the record in internal format. (There is only one contact date per CLP record.)

columns.name: HSP_ACCOUNT_ID
columns.description: The ID of the hospital account with which this claim record is associated.

columns.name: CM_PHY_OWN_ID
columns.description: ID of the physical deployment owner for this record. Physical owners will be where the data is hosted, either on the cross-over server or the owner deployment.
